name: .ESI
summary: Learn about .ESI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Because an ESI file is an XML document, you can open and edit it using any text editor. However, if you want to edit an IN file, it's best to use a source code editor, such as Xcode (Mac), NotePad++ (Windows), or Atom (multiplatform). These applications provide helpful source code editing tools and will highlight the ESI file's syntax correctly.
If you plan to make significant updates to an EtherCAT network or ESI file, you should use an EtherCAT configuration tool, such as Acontis Technologies EC-Engineer or port EtherCAT Design Tool.
